pogList.notes: You come down the star to a level that is dark, dank and smelly. It smells lightly as rotting bodies mixed with mold and mildew. The lights are very dim as if the power is only half on. The ventilation system seems to be barely working. You can hear sounds of fighting in the far distance. You get the feeling of hate! Something is trying to make you feel like you should kill everything in the area.
pogList.dmNotes: There is an aura of hate on this level.ï¿½ DC 10 will check can over come the feeling.

pogList.notes: This room looks like a storage area with lots of old crates piles around the walls. They are in bad shape and smell.
pogList.dmNotes: The crates are filled with rotting food. It is eatable but could cause disease.

pogList.notes: This is the goblin bathroom. It smells really bad. It doesn't look like they ever flushed the toilets.
This is the goblin barracks. Sleeping mats litter the area.
This room looks like a storage area with lots of old crates piles around the walls. They are in bad shape and smell.
pogList.dmNotes: Treasure room. Trapped chest of gold worth 1200 credits.

pogList.notes: You get a major feeling of hate coming from this room. You feel like you want to kill everything or anyone that isn't your friend.
pogList.dmNotes: This is a treasure room. It contains 1000 credits in misc stuff. It also has a strange beacon that pulses once a second. The beacon contains an invisibility mod that lasts for 10 minutes. If removed (DC15) Engineering check, it can be used in mod slot of armor or drone.
